>
[Falconsight Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2157)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This prosthetic eye resembles that of a bird of prey. Along with the abilities of the [_magical prosthetic eye_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2156), it allows you to strike foes at greater range and with impressive accuracy.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You become keenly aware of your foes, even those seemingly out of reach. For 1 minute, you can close your eyes as a free action to see through a ranged weapon you're wielding, which reduces the penalty for firing into your weapon's second [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) from –2 to 0. This effect doesn't negate the [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) condition.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
